external_games.name: Apprehending the Adventuer Chan! ~Live2D Tentacles Simulator~

name: Apprehending the Adventuer Chan!: Live2D Tentacles Simulator
summary: A tentacle training simulator developed specifically for experienced players. Players will control tentacles to fully train the captured adventurer-chan. All animations are rendered in full Live2D, providing immediate feedback based on various actions to satisfy your desires for tentacle training!
